<h1 align="center">z0xca/dotfiles</h1>

## Gallery

![](/.github/screenshots/1.png)
![](/.github/screenshots/2.png)
![](/.github/screenshots/3.png)
![](/.github/screenshots/4.png)

- P.1: [Fastfetch](https://github.com/fastfetch-cli/fastfetch), [CMatrix](https://github.com/abishekvashok/cmatrix), [mako](https://github.com/emersion/mako)
- P.2: [Neovim](https://github.com/neovim/neovim) with [LazyVim](https://github.com/LazyVim/LazyVim), [bottom](https://github.com/ClementTsang/bottom)
- P.3: [Yazi](https://github.com/sxyazi/yazi), [Zen Browser](https://github.com/zen-browser/desktop)
- P.4: [Vicinae](https://github.com/vicinaehq/vicinae)

## Software

- Distro: [Arch Linux](https://archlinux.org)
- WM: [Hyprland](https://github.com/hyprwm/Hyprland)
- Panel: [Waybar](https://github.com/Alexays/Waybar)
- Launcher: [Vicinae](https://github.com/vicinaehq/vicinae)
- Terminal: [WezTerm](https://github.com/wezterm/wezterm)
- Shell: [zsh](https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh) with [zsh-autosuggestions](https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions), [zsh-history-substring-search](https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-history-substring-search) and [zsh-syntax-highlighting](https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting)
- File Manager: [Yazi](https://github.com/sxyazi/yazi)
- Notifications: [mako](https://github.com/emersion/mako)
- Wallpaper utility: [hyprpaper](https://github.com/hyprwm/hyprpaper) with [hyprpaper-switcher](https://github.com/z0xca/hyprpaper-switcher) (plans to use [awww-switcher](https://github.com/vicinaehq/extensions/tree/main/extensions/awww-switcher) when [the refactor](https://github.com/0x4c756e61/vici-extensions/tree/refactor/awww-switcher/extensions/awww-switcher) will be merged)
- Lockscreen: [hyprlock](https://github.com/hyprwm/hyprlock)
- Idle daemon: [hypridle](https://github.com/hyprwm/hypridle)
- Screenshots: [HyprShot GUI](https://github.com/s-adi-dev/hyprshot-gui)
- System Monitor: [bottom](https://github.com/ClementTsang/bottom)
- Wi-Fi manager: [Vicinae Wiâ€‘Fi Commander extension](https://github.com/vicinaehq/extensions/tree/main/extensions/wifi-commander)
- Bluetooth manager: [Vicinae bluetooth extension](https://github.com/vicinaehq/extensions/tree/main/extensions/bluetooth)
- Volume Control: [wiremix](https://github.com/tsowell/wiremix)
- Browser: [Zen Browser](https://github.com/zen-browser/desktop)
- Fonts: [San Francisco](https://gitlab.com/chaotic-aur/pkgbuilds/-/tree/main/apple-fonts)
- Cursor: [Posy's Cursor Mono Black](https://github.com/simtrami/posy-improved-cursor-linux)
- GTK theme: [Orchis](https://github.com/vinceliuice/Orchis-theme)
- Color generation: [matugen](https://github.com/InioX/matugen)
